channel.title: Agervita, From Agriculture to Industry!
channel.description:
[b]What's it about?[/b]
You start with a field, some seeds, and the intention to build an entire kingdom! As you progress through the game you will progress from a small family run farm, to an agricultural village, to a full blown industrial metropolis! You'll make new tools, methods of farming, and gain NPC followers throughout your journey. Your decisions will determine how far you will venture, will you build a kingdom and gain vast riches, or will you die desperate and alone in an unforgiving wilderness?
[b]Progress?[/b]
As I'm making this game from scratch in C#, and I have little to know artistic skills, there isn't much to show, although I've already finished tons of back end systems that will drive the game through to completion!
Below I'll keep track of the progress, as well as some nice screenshots to gaze at
GUI Implementation - 60% / Still need to make a few behind the scenes improvements. Rendering Implementation - 100% / We're good to go here! Player Storage - 90% / Just need to setup the online database! Audio - 100% / We're all good here, just need to build an audio library! World Storage - 10% / I haven't worked on this much, although I know exactly how I'll complete this! Scripting - 30% / The backend implementation is there, I just need to bring in "hook-points", which will be editable through scripting! Game Art - 0% / Using borrowed sprites at the moment, going to have to find an artist!
[img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/d41272aa4fee023b778869e1796ec21c.png[/img] [img]http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/files/imagehost/pics/8a63a38d074a2475668e040e708661a3.png[/img]
[b]The Team:[/b]
Project Owner / Lead Programmer - General Pony / John. Artist - NA . Web Developer - Aaron.
* PM me if you're interesting in joining the team, work reference will be required!
Regards, GA
